data.title: Ayrshire College
data.meta_description:
Everyone has the potential to be successful and change their world. A positive attitude, industry relevant skills and current knowledge are key to unlocking this potential.
We will empower our students to achieve their full potential while supporting personal aspirations.

Our aim is to serve the people, communities and employers in Ayrshire.

data.text:
Ayrshire College welcomes Meghan Gallacher MSP

Ayrshire College was delighted to welcome the Deputy Leader of the Scottish Conservative and Unionist Party, Meghan Gallacher MSP, to its Ayr Campus on Tuesday, June 25.

College thrilled to play a part in former student’s football hit No Scotland No Party

Prestwick postie Nick Morgan has hit the headlines with his Euro 2024 football anthem No Scotland No Party — and hailed Ayrshire College for helping him go global!
